message: Greetings! I am offering a unique product for a price of $1000000. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, and I am confident you will find this product to be of exceptional value. Are you interested in making a purchase?

I'll take my chances. The probability of the product being high quality and the previous sale being high quality seems promising.
